hints.content:
![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/8a85e350fb58b2c3a5aaa34400ea2e33.png)

$\qquad \begin{align}&\green{12} \text{ pages on Monday}\\
+&  \underline{ \,\,\blue7 \text{ pages on Tuesday }}\\
=&\pink{19} \text{ pages total}\end{align}$

question.content:
On Monday James and his father started a new book and  read $12$ pages. On Tuesday they read $7$ pages to finish the book. 

**Write a number sentence to show how many pages were in the book. **

$12$ $ + $ [[☃ input-number 3]] $ = $ [[☃ input-number 4]]
